original_text: So all the men cut branches and followed Abimelek. They piled them against the stronghold and set it on fire with the people still inside. So all the people in the tower of Shechem, about a thousand men and women, also died.
korean_text: 모든 백성들도 각각 나뭇가지를 찍어서 아비멜렉을 따라 보루 위에 놓고 그것들이 얹혀 있는 보루에 불을 놓으매 세겜 망대에 있는 사람들이 다 죽었으니 남녀가 약 천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: So all the men cut branches
They piled them against the stronghold
So all the people in the tower of Shechem
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 세겜 탑 안의 모든 사람들

sentences.original_text: about a thousand men and women
